chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Sierin Vayu, p. 42 (40)—Amrylin Seat years ago, two Amyrlins before Siuan Sanche. She was raised from the Gray Ajah, but according to Moiraine she had more than a touch of Red in her. She only reigned for about two years, then died abruptly; Alviarin wonders whether Elaida had a hand in her death; the Black Ajah did not. See also Amyrlin Seat.
